title: Expect 2020 Election (with John Mills, JML)
itunes:title: Expect 2020 Election (with John Mills, JML)
description:
John Mills, founder and chairman of JML, and Labour's biggest private donor, says he doesn't expect a general election until the New Year. He tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Caroline Hepker he has reservations about Labour shadow chancellor John McDonnell's policies and whether they will grow the economy. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
John Mills, founder and chairman of JML, and Labour's biggest private donor, says he doesn't expect a general election until the New Year. He tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Caroline Hepker he has reservations about Labour shadow chancellor John McDonnell's policies and whether they will grow the economy. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: Bloomberg
